text:
I have a Form that optionally allows a file to be included in the Post.  The problem occurs when the 
user decides not to provide a file.  The proxy rewrites the content-type from multipart/form-data 
to application/x-www-form-urlencoded.

I believe the problem is with sendPostData() found 
in http sample post writer (PostWriter.java).
creator: des@rbii.com
mstover1@apache.org
text: I think I fixed it.  Let me know how it works for you.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
